description: Starts the workflow when Chargebee events occur

properties.name: events
properties.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

properties.name: Card Added
properties.description: Triggered when a card is added for a customer

properties.name: Card Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a card is deleted for a customer

properties.name: Card Expired
properties.description: Triggered when the card for a customer has expired

properties.name: Card Expiring
properties.description: Triggered when the customer's credit card is expiring soon.Triggered 30 days before the expiry date

properties.name: Card Updated
properties.description: Triggered when the card is updated for a customer

properties.name: Customer Changed
properties.description: Triggered when a customer is changed

properties.name: Customer Created
properties.description: Triggered when a customer is created

properties.name: Customer Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a customer is deleted

properties.name: Invoice Created
properties.description: Event triggered (in the case of metered billing) when a 'Pending' invoice is created that has usage related charges or line items to be added, before being closed. This is triggered only when the “Notify for Pending Invoices” option is enabled.

properties.name: Invoice Deleted
properties.description: Event triggered when an invoice is deleted

properties.name: Invoice Generated
properties.description: Event triggered when a new invoice is generated. In case of metered billing, this event is triggered when a 'Pending' invoice is closed.

properties.name: Invoice Updated
properties.description: Triggered when the invoice’s shipping/billing address is updated, if the invoice is voided, or when the amount due is modified due to payments applied/removed

properties.name: Payment Failed
properties.description: Triggered when attempt to charge customer's credit card fails

properties.name: Payment Initiated
properties.description: Triggered when a payment is initiated via direct debit

properties.name: Payment Refunded
properties.description: Triggered when a payment refund is made

properties.name: Payment Succeeded
properties.description: Triggered when the payment is successfully collected

properties.name: Refund Initiated
properties.description: Triggered when a refund is initiated via direct debit

properties.name: Subscription Activated
properties.description: Triggered after the subscription has been moved from 'Trial' to 'Active' state

properties.name: Subscription Cancellation Scheduled
properties.description: Triggered when subscription is scheduled to cancel at end of current term

properties.name: Subscription Cancelled
properties.description: Triggered when the subscription is cancelled. If it is cancelled due to non payment or because the card details are not present, the subscription will have the possible reason as 'cancel_reason'.

properties.name: Subscription Cancelling
properties.description: Triggered 6 days prior to the scheduled cancellation date

properties.name: Subscription Changed
properties.description: Triggered when the subscription's recurring items are changed

properties.name: Subscription Created
properties.description: Triggered when a new subscription is created

properties.name: Subscription Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a subscription is deleted

properties.name: Subscription Reactivated
properties.description: Triggered when the subscription is moved from cancelled state to 'Active' or 'Trial' state

properties.name: Subscription Renewal Reminder
properties.description: Triggered 3 days before each subscription's renewal

properties.name: Subscription Renewed
properties.description: Triggered when the subscription is renewed from the current term

properties.name: Subscription Scheduled Cancellation Removed
properties.description: Triggered when scheduled cancellation is removed for the subscription

properties.name: Subscription Shipping Address Updated
properties.description: Triggered when shipping address is added or updated for a subscription

properties.name: Subscription Started
properties.description: Triggered when a 'future' subscription gets started

properties.name: Subscription Trial Ending
properties.description: Triggered 6 days prior to the trial period's end date

properties.name: Transaction Created
properties.description: Triggered when a transaction is recorded

properties.name: Transaction Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a transaction is deleted

properties.name: Transaction Updated
properties.description: Triggered when a transaction is updated. E.g. (1) When a transaction is removed, (2) or when an excess payment is applied on an invoice, (3) or when amount_capturable gets updated.
